name: Personal Project Demo
description:
Hey!

This game is a short, 4 level demo for my 10th grade personal project. Its a functional prototype, and can be fully played without bugs. If you choose to play this game, please fill out the feedback form to improve it in the future:

https://forms.gle/DtejRVwnLVTxV9sF6

You wake up in an unknown place. You cant remember who you are, where you are, or why you are there. Still, there has to be a way out, right?

Controls: 

WASD to move

SHIFT to slow down time (you need it for most puzzles)

SPACE to attack

ESC to quit (hold for 2 secs)

IMPORTANT NOTE:

After completing level 4, there is no more to the game. All you can do is quit and restart if you wanted to.
